title: Create a Registration Form
description: Build a user registration form including fields for name, email, password, and a submit button. Use appropriate input types.
solution:
<form>
  <label>Name:</label>
  <input type="text" name="name" required>
  <label>Email:</label>
  <input type="email" name="email" required>
  <label>Password:</label>
  <input type="password" name="password" required>
  <button type="submit">Register</button>
</form>
hints: Use type='email' and type='password' for correctness.

title: Add Video with Controls
description: Insert an HTML5 video element with controls enabled and a fallback message if the browser does not support it.
solution:
<video width="400" controls>
  <source src="demo.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  Your browser does not support video.
</video>

title: Create Contact Form
description: Create a contact form with fields: Name, Email, Message (textarea), and a Send button.
solution:
<form>
  <label>Name:</label>
  <input type="text" required>
  <label>Email:</label>
  <input type="email" required>
  <label>Message:</label>
  <textarea required></textarea>
  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>
